name.namePart: Printed Los Angeles by Joe Funk

mods.abstract: A hoard of imaginary creatures are arranged in this print to symbolize the idea of an invasion.
mods.note: the initial drawing was made using lithographic pencil, lithographic crayon, ink and brush. Ms. Durieux used scraping in areas to serve as a highlighting method. The two colors used are greyish-yellow and dark grey.

name.namePart: Louisiana State University (Baton Rouge, La.). Museum of Art
